SUMMARY.TITLE: How does OpenPass work?
SUMMARY.OPEN_PASS_POWERED: OpenPass is powered by Unified ID, which is an improvement over third-party cookies that offers more privacy control. It can:
SUMMARY.REDUCE: Reduce how often you have to consent to annoying cookie banners
SUMMARY.SHOW: Show you more relevant and fewer repeat ads
SUMMARY.SUPPORT: Support free content on the open internet
SUMMARY.MENAGE_SETTINGS: Manage your settings in the privacy portal.
